ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound tiger prawns, peeled and deveined
¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes

cookingTips: Cook shrimp only until they turn pink and opaque—overcooking makes them tough and rubbery
Crush garlic with the flat of your knife to release more flavor into the butter sauce
Let the butter and broth emulsify into a silky sauce by swirling gently rather than stirring aggressively
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This dish relies on a simple butter sauce—how does the chicken broth lighten this classic preparation and what effect does that have?
